title: Update PhpWebStudy
text1: 1. When PhpWebStudy starts, it will automatically detect if there is a new version, and if there is a new version, a pop-up window will indicate that there is a new version available for installation, and after the user clicks the confirm button, the application will automatically download and install the update.
text2: 2. After the application is opened, you can click the Detect Update menu in the top left corner of the screen to check if there is a new version, and when there is a new version, you can click the Confirm button to install the update automatically.
text3_1: 3. Users can also download the latest version of phpwebstudy from the download page
